description: A barrel floating in the ocean with the word 'Treasure' written on it. When opened by the Straw Hats, it triggers a massive red flare that shoots fireworks into the sky, serving as a signal or trap.
significance: The flare from this barrel marks the beginning of the Thriller Bark arc, pulling the Straw Hats into a storm that leads them to the Florian Triangle. It may have been a deliberate trap to lure ships into the fog.

keyMoments.title: Discovery of the Mysterious Barrel
keyMoments.description: Zoro spots the barrel floating in the ocean. Despite warnings, the crew opens it, triggering a flare.

trivia: The barrel was labeled with 'Gift to the God of the Sea' according to some accounts, or 'Treasure' according to others
The flare serves as a lure for ships entering the Florian Triangle
